content:
Anyone know what's the difference between full member and member?
and also there access and permissions ??

Neil Pilgrim said:

https://zulip.com/help/restrict-permissions-of-new-members

thanks but can you tell me difference of member and full member

As that page says:

Members are new members from when they join till when their account ages past a certain waiting period threshold. After that they are full members. You can configure how long the waiting period is, as well as which actions require being a full member.

Currently, the following actions support limiting access to full members.

Creating streams
Adding users to streams
Restricting posting to a stream

I think what you're referring to as "member" is probably roughly what that page calls "new member" (or perhaps "member" = "new member"+"full member"). So, "duration of membership" or "permissions, depending on realm configuration", depending on whether you mean "what controls which category somebody falls into" or "what is the impact of the category"
Was there something you wanted to know that that page wasn't addressing?

Alex Dehnert said:

Was there something you wanted to know that that page wasn't addressing?

So Member and full member is one not have any difference .
On this realm, for example, I think creating streams is doable by full members but not new members.
(Organization settings -> Organization permissions (you may need to choose show more) -> stream permissions)

Alex Dehnert said:

On this realm, for example, I think creating streams is doable by full members but not new members.

Yes

Alex Dehnert said:

(Organization settings -> Organization permissions (you may need to choose show more) -> stream permissions)

Yeah I check but I need to understand how this will work
Sorry, I'm still not sure what you're asking.
I only question is that how to become full member
In the settings you can configure that a new joined member is a full member after X days

Felix (strifel) said:

In the settings you can configure that a new joined member is a full member after X days

okay thanks
